Acquirer.description: Acquirer of the ATM transaction, in charge of the funds settlement with the issuer.

Brand.description: Brand of the Acquirer of transactions captured by the ATM

BrandName.description: Brand of the Acquirer of transactions captured by the ATM

BrandOwner.description: Unique and unambiguous way of identifying an organisation.

LEI.description: Legal entity identification as an alternate identification for a party.

AnyBIC.description: Code allocated to a financial institution or non financial institution by the ISO 9362 Registration Authority as described in ISO 9362 'Banking - Banking telecommunication messages - Business identifier code (BIC)'

FullLegalName.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party.

Identification.description: ATM terminal device identification for the acquirer and the issuer.

ATMServices.description: Describes the type of transaction available for a customer on an ATM.

SupportedLanguages.description: Identification of the language name according to the ISO 639-1 codes. The type is validated by the list of values coded with two alphabetic characters, defined in the standard.

Access24HoursIndicator.description: Indicates that the ATM is available for use by customers 24 hours per day

BaseCurrency.description: A code allocated to a currency by a Maintenance Agency under an international identification scheme as described in the latest edition of the international standard ISO 4217 'Codes for the representation of currencies and funds'

MinimumPossibleAmount.description: Minimum amount allowed for a transaction in the service.

OtherAccessibility.description: Enter a new code, name, and description for any other ATM accessibility options

Description.description: Description to describe the purpose of the code

Name.description: Long name associated with the code

Code.description: The four letter Mnemonic used within an XML file to identify a code

OtherATMServices.description: Enter a new code, name, and description for any other ATM Service

Description.description: Description to describe the purpose of the code

Name.description: Long name associated with the code

Code.description: The four letter Mnemonic used within an XML file to identify a code

Branch.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific branch of a financial institution.

BranchData.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

LocationCategory.description: Indicates the physical environment of the ATM.

OtherLocationCategory.description: Enter a new code, name, and description for any other location category

Description.description: Description to describe the purpose of the code

Name.description: Long name associated with the code

Code.description: The four letter Mnemonic used within an XML file to identify a code

Site.description: Used by a Financial Institution internally to identify the location of an ATM.

Identification.description: ATM site identification for the Financial Institution.

Name.description: ATM site name as used by Financial Institution.

PostalAddress.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services or in free format text.

AddressLine.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in free format text.

BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

StreetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare

TownName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

CountrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country, for instance state, region, county.

Country.description: Nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

PostCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail

GeoLocation.description: Geographic location of the ATM specified by geographic coordinates or UTM coordinates.

Location1.description: Location on the Earth specified by two numbers representing vertical and horizontal position.

Latitude.description: The Latitude measured in decimal format according to ISO 213

Longitude.description: The longitude measured in decimal format according to ISO 213
